exploreMoreDescription: Discover our full range of premium vitamins and supplements
aboutContent: Highly effective ZMA capsules - Each vegan-friendly capsule contains 187.5 mg magnesium, 10 mg zinc and 6 mg vitamin B6. Physical activity can deplete important minerals, and our ZMA formula ensures replenishment of these nutrients to support your overall well-being. Our supplements are GMP compliant, manufactured in certified facilities meeting strict UK/EU guidelines. Includes a satisfaction guarantee - contact us for a full refund if not completely satisfied.
descriptionContent: Nutriota ZMA Complex combines zinc, magnesium and vitamin B6 to meet your body's needs after sports. Zinc supports cell growth, skin regeneration and immune defenses. Magnesium ensures balanced electrolyte balance, stimulates energy metabolism and supports the neuromuscular system. Benefits include supporting muscle recovery, promoting restful sleep, strengthening immune defenses, promoting energy metabolism, and ensuring balanced electrolyte balance.
ingredientsContent: Magnesium oxide powder (magnesium), filler (microcrystalline cellulose), capsule shell (hydroxypropylmethylcellulose), zinc oxide (zinc), pyridoxine hydrochloride (vitamin B6), release agent (magnesium salts of fatty acids, silicon dioxide).
informationContent: Allergen Information: Contains: Gluten Free | Units: 70 gram | Brand: Nutriota | Format: Capsule
